criteria.text: VarietyParams has all 10 fields: scale_min, scale_max, scale_y_bias, random_y_rotation, tilt_max_degrees, hue_shift_range, saturation_range, brightness_range, noise_displacement, noise_frequency
SimpleRng (xorshift32) produces deterministic output for a given seed

criteria.text: seed_from_position() maps world coordinates to deterministic seeds
criteria.notes: Uses wrapping_mul hash mixing of float bits

worker_notes: Implemented variety.rs as a pure math/data module. Added serde dependency to Cargo.toml since it was missing. SimpleRng uses xorshift32 (<<13, >>17, <<5). seed_from_position uses wrapping_mul hash mixing of float bit representations. apply_color_variety converts RGB to HSV, applies shifts, clamps, and converts back. Four category presets cover organic-to-man-made spectrum. Comprehensive test suite included.
